channel.title: KenSmith tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KenSmith.

item.description: The temperature just dropped several degrees as I stood on the sidewalk watching the front come in. https://t.co/2TTpwDVRhI
item.source:markdown: The temperature just dropped several degrees as I stood on the sidewalk watching the front come in. https://t.co/2TTpwDVRhI

item.description: "If Democrats and Republicans got the same number of votes, Republicans would win 64.8 percent of State Senate seats, and Democrats around 35.2 percent." https://t.co/7uoBGTq0q7
item.source:markdown: "If Democrats and Republicans got the same number of votes, Republicans would win 64.8 percent of State Senate seats, and Democrats around 35.2 percent." https://t.co/7uoBGTq0q7

item.description:
An overview & infographic for MCDP 8, the newly published manual for the Marine Corps' information theory.

https://t.co/rQ1QrNVeqW https://t.co/ohBLOSMpnR
item.source:markdown:
An overview & infographic for MCDP 8, the newly published manual for the Marine Corps' information theory.
https://t.co/rQ1QrNVeqW https://t.co/ohBLOSMpnR

item.description: "If we're returning to the days when Democrats have one newspaper, Republicans have another newspaper, we might not like that, but there's precedent for it." https://t.co/i5MfkgfB6T
item.source:markdown: "If we're returning to the days when Democrats have one newspaper, Republicans have another newspaper, we might not like that, but there's precedent for it." https://t.co/i5MfkgfB6T

item.description:
The Marine Corps has published MCDP 8, a manual of its information theory, including ideas about a unit's vulnerability to propaganda via social media.

Available in bound copies and on Kindle. https://t.co/ixxXtbBK89
item.source:markdown:
The Marine Corps has published MCDP 8, a manual of its information theory, including ideas about a unit's vulnerability to propaganda via social media.
Available in bound copies and on Kindle. https://t.co/ixxXtbBK89

item.description: The Marine Corps sees its individuals and units as vulnerable to information warfare and wants to develop media literacy training. https://t.co/GmEHn9vdhd
item.source:markdown: The Marine Corps sees its individuals and units as vulnerable to information warfare and wants to develop media literacy training. https://t.co/GmEHn9vdhd

item.description:
Done right, stories on radio rev up a listener's imagination. Suspense works beautifully, too. When a yellow wasp lands on the infant's cheek and begins to clean its forelegs one against the other, you feel the peril.

Most radio programming tosses those resources out the window. https://t.co/CtqM73fjEc
item.source:markdown:
Done right, stories on radio rev up a listener's imagination. Suspense works beautifully, too. When a yellow wasp lands on the infant's cheek and begins to clean its forelegs one against the other, you feel the peril.
Most radio programming tosses those resources out the window. https://t.co/CtqM73fjEc

item.description: Correction from local authorities. The car with the solo driver was headed south, not north, and it was not that car but the other one, carrying the elected official and two staff members, heading north, not south, that crossed the highway's dividing line. https://t.co/uK8bVEeUPY
item.source:markdown: Correction from local authorities. The car with the solo driver was headed south, not north, and it was not that car but the other one, carrying the elected official and two staff members, heading north, not south, that crossed the highway's dividing line. https://t.co/uK8bVEeUPY

item.description: Knitting and other textile practices are "meaning-making activities" that connect "back to the efforts of our earliest ancestors to find 'system and story' in their worlds (Dissanayake 2000, 86)." https://t.co/8o2PYCnC6S
item.source:markdown: Knitting and other textile practices are "meaning-making activities" that connect "back to the efforts of our earliest ancestors to find 'system and story' in their worlds (Dissanayake 2000, 86)." https://t.co/8o2PYCnC6S

item.description: "And you can almost taste the pressure now. Koufax lifted his cap, ran his fingers through his black hair, then pulled the cap back down, fussing at the bill. Krug must feel it too as he backs out, heaves a sigh . . ." Vin Scully calls the perfect game. https://t.co/z9qXPIvUTs
item.source:markdown: "And you can almost taste the pressure now. Koufax lifted his cap, ran his fingers through his black hair, then pulled the cap back down, fussing at the bill. Krug must feel it too as he backs out, heaves a sigh . . ." Vin Scully calls the perfect game. https://t.co/z9qXPIvUTs

item.description: In a deeply segregated country or world, certain places relax social barriers enough for our shared humanity to show itself. For Malcolm X, that was Mecca, and for Akhil Sharma, Disney World. https://t.co/cfuFlP93w1
item.source:markdown: In a deeply segregated country or world, certain places relax social barriers enough for our shared humanity to show itself. For Malcolm X, that was Mecca, and for Akhil Sharma, Disney World. https://t.co/cfuFlP93w1

item.description:
In 1990, an amendment was proposed to the Indiana Constitution:

“A woman may not be compelled to complete or terminate her pregnancy.” https://t.co/zUZCJWxGxy
item.source:markdown:
In 1990, an amendment was proposed to the Indiana Constitution:
“A woman may not be compelled to complete or terminate her pregnancy.” https://t.co/zUZCJWxGxy

item.description: “Indiana legislators have rarely allowed Hoosiers to speak on ballot questions.” (And stir in the gerrymandered one-party supermajority in both the House and Senate.) https://t.co/TfqgTL3zrM
item.source:markdown: “Indiana legislators have rarely allowed Hoosiers to speak on ballot questions.” (And stir in the gerrymandered one-party supermajority in both the House and Senate.) https://t.co/TfqgTL3zrM

item.description: Abortion bans in red states "are often an expression not of democratic wishes, but of lawmakers’ insulation from democratic accountability." https://t.co/7uoBGTq0q7
item.source:markdown: Abortion bans in red states "are often an expression not of democratic wishes, but of lawmakers’ insulation from democratic accountability." https://t.co/7uoBGTq0q7

item.description: "The stunning result in an abortion referendum in Kansas on Tuesday, however, shows that even in a very red state, bans cannot necessarily survive contact with democracy." https://t.co/7uoBGTq0q7
item.source:markdown: "The stunning result in an abortion referendum in Kansas on Tuesday, however, shows that even in a very red state, bans cannot necessarily survive contact with democracy." https://t.co/7uoBGTq0q7

item.description: Families, friends, and community members are shaken by the loss of four Hoosier residents in a car accident near Nappanee today, including IN-2nd U. S. House District Representative Jackie Walorski.
item.source:markdown: Families, friends, and community members are shaken by the loss of four Hoosier residents in a car accident near Nappanee today, including IN-2nd U. S. House District Representative Jackie Walorski.

item.description: Arlo Guthrie talks about being proud of American music and sings "I Can't Help Falling In Love With You." https://t.co/jQkCHgN7mW
item.source:markdown: Arlo Guthrie talks about being proud of American music and sings "I Can't Help Falling In Love With You." https://t.co/jQkCHgN7mW

item.description:
Universities disincentivize faculty from learning how to speak and write well for wide audiences.

In doing so, public universities give taxpayers less than they have paid for.

And some faculty grow vain: “Those people on the outside could never handle our best ideas . . .” https://t.co/R3JuFRGvh5
item.source:markdown:
Universities disincentivize faculty from learning how to speak and write well for wide audiences.
In doing so, public universities give taxpayers less than they have paid for.
And some faculty grow vain: “Those people on the outside could never handle our best ideas . . .” https://t.co/R3JuFRGvh5

item.description: An old memory came to mind, from about 1980. https://t.co/ok5KJPL3Zd

item.description:
I was making a mental list of beautiful things while visiting Chicago last weekend. Fragile, vulnerable, may all be swept away, but undeniable things there in the city and its people.

Public art piece near Ukrainian Village, Chicago. https://t.co/6hmqpLTLPW
item.source:markdown:
I was making a mental list of beautiful things while visiting Chicago last weekend. Fragile, vulnerable, may all be swept away, but undeniable things there in the city and its people.
Public art piece near Ukrainian Village, Chicago. https://t.co/6hmqpLTLPW

item.description: @JMDanks1 Our friends at @PrairieLights might know.

item.description: By a roughly 3-to-2 margin, Kansas voters protect their access to abortion. https://t.co/A6IIIFxV9k
item.source:markdown: By a roughly 3-to-2 margin, Kansas voters protect their access to abortion. https://t.co/A6IIIFxV9k

item.description: How much we need strong regulatory agencies, skillful watchdog journalists, and activist citizens groups, and why we always will. https://t.co/H946RU805N
item.source:markdown: How much we need strong regulatory agencies, skillful watchdog journalists, and activist citizens groups, and why we always will. https://t.co/H946RU805N

item.description: “Americans were good at democracy because they practiced democracy.“ https://t.co/BBpSD14y6W
item.source:markdown: “Americans were good at democracy because they practiced democracy.“ https://t.co/BBpSD14y6W
